Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8)
cold damage.
Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15
Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

The dragon can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult
terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra moment.

name: Young White Dragon
senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 16
